refnamediv.refpurpose: Command-line program for deleting LDB records

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbdel deletes records from an ldb(3) database. It deletes the records identified by the dn's specified on the command-line.
ldbdel uses either the database that is specified with the -H option or the database specified by the LDB_URL environment variable.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(3) for details.
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)
